description.summary: A structured, educational web design showcasing a clean two-column layout with a harmonious color palette of greens, yellows, and neutrals
description.visual_style: Minimal and functional design approach with clear section delineation and hierarchical organization of content
description.emotional_impact: Calm, meditative atmosphere created through soft green tones and ample white space, evoking the 'zen' theme
description.compositional_elements: Two-column structure with clearly defined navigation sidebar and content area, using consistent header treatments and subtle separators

artistic_context.style_influences: Early 2000s web design aesthetic with modern minimalist sensibilities
artistic_context.visual_metaphors: Garden as a metaphor for cultivation and growth, expressed through the green color palette and organic header imagery
